heading: Your Anime Streaming Guide
heading-sub: Track, share, and discover your favorite anime and manga with AniTrek.
discover-sub: Find where to stream, TV shows and movies with AniTrek.
engage-sub: Join our lively community, connect, and discover recommendations.
track-sub: On-the-go with AniTrek apps available on iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows.
all-in-one-place-description: Discover new content easily with personalized recommendations for your favorite streaming services.
advance-search-description: Say goodbye to platform-hopping. Our vast database has you covered across providers.
one-synced-description: Merge your anime and manga preferences into a single synced list, accessible across all devices and streaming platforms.
push-notification-description: Stay updated with push notifications for the latest releases in anime and manga.
